data.eml:eml: Erhaia Davis & Kuo (Gastropoda, Rissooidea, Amnicolidae) also in Bhutan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gittenberger, Edmund, Sherub, Sherub, Stelbrink, Bjoern (2017): Erhaia Davis & Kuo (Gastropoda, Rissooidea, Amnicolidae) also in Bhutan. ZooKeys 679: 21-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.679.13326, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.679.13326
